mast2txt

Usage: mast2txt <mast xml file> <output text file>

Description:

Provides backwards compatibility by converting a mast xml file into a mast text file. Warning: Mast text format will not be supported in the next release.

Input:

<mast xml file> - An xml file created by the mast program.

<output text file> - The name of the text file to output to.

Output:

Writes mast text output to the file name passed.
